subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] File posted. Weird one.
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Some of my best EVP's so far were obtained in the former Manteno State 
Mental Hospital in Illinois.  There are evidently a LOT of spirits around 
that site.  And they may be dead but they're still insane.

Zack

On Mon, 28 Jan 2008, Lisby wrote:

> They might. From what I have heard of other people's cemetery EVPs, it sounds 
> like a lot of cemeteries are populated with people who haven't made it over. 
> I find cemetery EVP to be the most fascinating because they seem to offer a 
> glimpse into a chaotic and not-so-pretty part of the After Life that very few 
> are willing to look at. Our cemeteries seem to me to truly be cities of the 
> dead.
>
> Ann
